testCase.name: Authenticate Use Case - should be able to authenticate
Authenticate Use Case - should not be able to authenticate with wrong email
Authenticate Use Case - should not be able to authenticate with wrong password
CheckIn Use Case - should be able to check in
CheckIn Use Case - should not be able to check in twice in the same day
CheckIn Use Case - should be able to check in twice but in different days
CheckIn Use Case - should not be able to check in on distant gym
Create Gym Use Case - should be able to create Gym
Fetch Nearby Use Case - should be able to fetch nearby gyms
CheckIn Use Case - should be able to fetch check-in history
CheckIn Use Case - should be able to fetch paginated check-in history
Get User Metrics Use Case - should be able to get check-ins count from metrics
Get User Profile User Case - should be able to get user profile
Get User Profile User Case - should be able to get user profile with wrong id
Register Use Case - should be able to registration
Register Use Case - should hash user password upon registration
Register Use Case - should not able to register with same email twice
Search Gyms Use Case - should be able to search for gyms
Search Gyms Use Case - should be able to fetch paginated gyms search
Validate CheckIn Use Case - should be able to validate the check-in
Validate CheckIn Use Case - should not be able to validate an inexistent check-in
Validate CheckIn Use Case - should not be able to validate the check-in after 20 minutes of its creation
